concept.title: Refunds
concept.shortdesc: Create and process refunds directly from a Receipt record created via a paid sales order or invoice.

conbody.p: Organizations often need to complete refunds in the event of a customer request to remove an item from a receipt, an error on an invoice, or any other type of adjustment after a sales order or invoice has already been paid.

In the system, completing a refund transaction is a two step process:
Creating a Refund
Processing a Refund
There is the ability in the system to complete a partial refund as well. Refunds can be made in the system for both ePayments (credit cards, etc.) and checks.
